attributes.action: prevent the transport minister inplementing the proposal to make motorists (including motor cyclists) wholely responsible in the event of an accident involving a pedal cyclist and to either enforce or bring into being laws to make pedal cyclists responsible for their actions whilst riding on a public highway.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Road users are regularly placed in a dangererous situation due to the lack of care and concern and the flouting of road traffic legislation by pedal cyclists.
Any suggestion that UK laws should be changed to make anyone apart from a pedal cyclist being responsible for an accident is a travesty of justice and will only lead to a further deterioration of the road safety manners of pedal cyclists.
